One of Gabrielle Giffords ' close friends, New York Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand , was in the room when Gabrielle Giffords opened her eyes in response to her husband's voice. All of a sudden she started to struggle to open her eyes. And so Mark saw that and said-- "open your eyes, Gabrielle Giffords , open your eyes," recalled Kirsten Gillibrand . "She kept struggling and struggling and Mark kept encouraging her. And with in a moment she literally opened her eyes. The doctor was unbelievably excited because this was such great progress."

Eric Schmidt will step down as the CEO of Google in April, the company announced today via official blog post. Mr. Eric Schmidt will remain executive chairman and serve as adviser to Mr. Page and Sergey Brin , the other company co-founder and its president of technology, reports the New York Times. But tech blogger Owen Thomas tells a more nuanced story. Thomas points out that "Page was Google's first CEO, and held the job from 1998 to 2001,

Mr David Cameron said: I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so. " Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government. The statement comes just days after the prime minister refused to deny reports that Mr Andy Coulson had already offered his resignation.
